data.TITLE: Cisco AsyncOS Secure Email Gateway Remote Command Execution (RCE) Vulnerability (CVE-2025-20393)
data.SOFTWARE_LIST: asyncos, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m195, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m190, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m390x, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m170, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m680, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m690, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_virtual_appliance_m100v, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m395, cisco, secure_email_gateway_virtual_appliance_c600v, cisco, secure_email_gateway_c395, cisco, secure_email_gateway_c195, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m695, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m380, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m690x, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_virtual_appliance_m300v, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_m390, cisco, secure_email_and_web_manager_virtual_appliance_m600v, cisco, secure_email_gateway_virtual_appliance_c100v, cisco, secure_email_gateway_virtual_appliance_c300v, cisco, secure_email_gateway_c695, cisco
data.DIAGNOSIS:
Cisco AsyncOS Secure Email Gateway is an advanced appliance/service protecting email by filtering spam, malware, and phishing using deep packet inspection, reputation filtering (Talos), sandboxing, and outbreak protection.

Cisco is aware of a potential vulnerability.  Cisco is currently investigating and will update these details as appropriate as more information becomes available.

Affected Products
Cisco AsyncOS Secure Email Gateway

QID Detection Logic (Unauthenticated):
This QID sends a HTTP GET request and checks the response to confirm if the host is running vulnerable version of Cisco AsyncOS Secure Email Gateway.
data.CONSEQUENCE: Successful exploitation of this Cisco Secure Email Gateway/Secure Email attack can allow unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary commands with root privileges on affected systems.
data.SOLUTION: Customers are advised to refer to cisco-sa-sma-attack-N9bf4 for more information.
